        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if var is in the active scope, false otherwise

               throws MMException
        Checks the validity of a new constant.
        Parameters:
        cn - a constant
        Throws:
        MMException - if the constant is already declared as a variable

        void checkNewLabel(String label)
            throws MMException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        MMException - if the label is already in use

      • checkLabelAndType

        void checkLabelAndType(String label,
                       String type)
                throws MMException
        Checks the validity of a label and type.
        Parameters:
        label - the identifying label of the statement
        type - the type of the statement
        Throws:
        MMException - if the label is already in use, or if the type is either not declared or is already declared as a variable

      • checkNewVarHyp

        void checkNewVarHyp(String label,
                    String type,
                    String var)
             throws MMException
        Checks the components of a variable-type hypothesis.
        Parameters:
        label - the identifying label of the hypothesis
        type - the type of the hypothesis
        var - the variable of the hypothesis
        Throws:
        MMException - if the label is already in use, if the variable is not declared, or if the type is either not declared or is already declared as a variable

      • checkDisjVars

        void checkDisjVars(String[] vars)
            throws MMException
        Checks that the variables in string array are unique.
        Parameters:
        vars - a string array of variables
        Throws:
        MMException - if the variables are not unique
